column1: AND(HAS_NEUTROPHILS_ABS_OF_AT_LEAST_X[1.5], HAS_HEMOGLOBIN_G_PER_DL_OF_AT_LEAST_X[9], HAS_THROMBOCYTES_ABS_OF_AT_LEAST_X[100], OR(HAS_TOTAL_BILIRUBIN_ULN_OF_AT_MOST_X[1.5], AND(OR(HAS_TOTAL_BILIRUBIN_ULN_OF_AT_MOST_X[3], HAS_DIRECT_BILIRUBIN_ULN_OF_AT_MOST_X[1.5]), HAS_GILBERT_DISEASE)), HAS_EGFR_CKD_EPI_OF_AT_LEAST_X[30], HAS_ASAT_AND_ALAT_ULN_OF_AT_MOST_X_OR_AT_MOST_Y_WHEN_LIVER_METASTASES_PRESENT[3, 5], HAS_ALP_ULN_OF_AT_MOST_X[5], OR(HAS_STABLE_ANTICOAGULANT_MEDICATION_DOSING, HAS_APTT_ULN_OF_AT_MOST_X[1.5]))
